text: 1 levodopa+benserazide 50+12.5 mg orally, 3 times daily, increasing to 100+25 mg 3 times daily over 1 to 2 weeks 006 OR 1 levodopa+carbidopa 50+12.5 mg orally, 3 times daily, increasing to 100+25 mg 3 times daily over 1 to 2 weeks 00 OR 2 pramipexole 0.125 mg orally, 3 times daily, slowly titrating to effect, to a maximum of 1.5 mg 3 times daily 6 9 OR 2 pramipexole modified-release 0.375 mg orally, once daily, slowly titrating to effect, to a maximum of 4.5 mg once daily 00 OR 2 rotigotine 2 mg transdermally, once daily applied for 24 hours, increasing by 2 mg every week until an effective dose is reached, to a maximum of 8 mg once daily. 6 @
